altername_name: Shinsou Kaiten!! Wan Wan Umi Monogatari - Sanyo Pachinko Paradise DX
name: Shinsou Kaiten: Wanwan Umi Monogatari: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise DX News
overview: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise DX - Shinsou Kaiten - Wanwan Umi Monogatari is the sixth & last game for the Playstation One console in the longest pachinko gambling series (they continue the series in the Playstation 2 console) made by Irem, the game features 5 pachinko machines.
